title: GethisGreen Luxury Brand

title: Jinterros Premium Rum
description: Buy Premium Jinterros Rum, A Rum with Natural Flavours. Jinterros Rum is an e-commerce site that allows you to order Rum & Cocktails, this site comes with an admin panel and sends both admin and customers email notifications.

title: Best Stores
description: Buy phones, electronics, sunshades, home decor. This store is a demo e-commerce store that leverages on Next.js, dummyJSON API, Firebase and Stripe.

title: Near Resume
description: Create a New Resume with your details and download it as a pdf, make payment in $NEAR token. This web3 desktop project was submitted for NEAR metabuild hackathon. It's powered by Next.js, Rust, Firebase, Google login, token payment

title: RapydFreelancer
description: RapydFreelancer is an exclusive network of the top freelance software developers, copywriters, product managers, designers, finance experts and data scientist in the world. Top companies hire RapydFreelancers for their projects.
